userQuery: Create an elegant portfolio landing page with a fixed navigation header, hero section with professional photo and introduction text, skills section with progress bars, portfolio gallery with image grid and modal lightbox, client testimonials carousel, contact form with validation, and footer with social links. Use clean typography and subtle animations.
plan:
# Portfolio Landing Page – Structural Plan

## 1) Global Layout & Theming
- Layout Components:
  - Page Container (sets max-width, responsive grid, global spacing, typography scale)
  - Fixed Header (sticky top, shadow on scroll)
  - Main Content Wrapper (sections stacked with generous whitespace)
  - Footer (full-width, subtle divider)
- Theming & Assets:
  - Typography scale (clean sans-serif for body, elegant serif or high-contrast sans for headings)
  - Color tokens (primary, accent, neutral, background, surface)
  - Motion tokens (subtle fade/slide durations, easing)
  - Breakpoints (mobile, tablet, desktop)
- Required Global Data:
  - Site metadata (title, description)
  - Brand/logo asset
  - Navigation items (label, href, in-page anchors)
  - Social links (platform, url, icon)

## 2) Header / Navigation (Fixed)
- Components:
  - Top Bar Container (sticky)
  - Brand/Logo (clickable to top)
  - Primary Nav (horizontal list, anchor links)
  - CTA Button (e.g., “Contact” or “Hire Me”)
  - Mobile Nav Toggle (hamburger button)
  - Slide-in Mobile Menu (drawer with nav items + CTA)
- Interactions:
  - Active section highlighting (scrollspy)
  - Smooth scroll to anchors
  - Header elevates with shadow on scroll
- Data Needed:
  - navigationItems: [{label, href, icon?}]
  - brand: {logoSrc, altText}
  - cta: {label, href}

## 3) Hero Section
- Components:
  - Two-Column Layout (photo left/right, intro text opposite; stacks on mobile)
  - Profile Image (professional photo, decorative frame)
  - Intro Text Block (headline, subheadline, short bio)
  - Primary CTA Buttons (e.g., “View Work”, “Download CV”)
  - Social Icon Row (optional duplication of footer for quick access)
- Animations:
  - Subtle fade-in/slide-up on load
  - Image parallax or gentle scale on hover
- Data Needed:
  - hero: {headline, subheadline, bio, primaryCta:{label,href}, secondaryCta:{label,href}}
  - profileImage: {src, alt}
  - socialLinks: [{platform, url, icon}]

## 4) Skills Section
- Components:
  - Section Header (title, description)
  - Skills Grid (2–3 columns)
  - Skill Item:
    - Skill Name
    - Progress Bar (animated fill on viewport)
    - Proficiency Label (e.g., 85%)
- Accessibility:
  - Progress bars with aria-valuenow/aria-valuemin/aria-valuemax
- Data Needed:
  - skills: [{name, levelPercent, category?}]

## 5) Portfolio Gallery
- Components:
  - Section Header (title, filters)
  - Filter/Chips Bar (All, Web, Mobile, Branding, etc.)
  - Responsive Image Grid (cards)
  - Portfolio Card:
    - Thumbnail Image
    - Title
    - Tags/Category
    - Hover Overlay (quick view button)
  - Modal Lightbox:
    - Carousel of images/video
    - Project details (description, role, tools, link to live/demo)
    - Prev/Next controls, Close button
- Interactions:
  - Filter transitions (isotope-like animation)
  - Keyboard navigation in modal
- Data Needed:
  - portfolioItems: [{id, title, coverSrc, alt, media:[{src,type}], categories:[string], description, role, tools:[string], liveLink?}]

## 6) Testimonials Carousel
- Components:
  - Section Header
  - Carousel Track (slides)
  - Testimonial Card:
    - Quote text
    - Client name, title, company logo (optional)
    - Avatar
  - Controls: Prev/Next buttons, dots/pagination
- Interactions:
  - Auto-play with pause on hover; swipe on mobile
  - Accessible controls with aria-live polite
- Data Needed:
  - testimonials: [{quote, name, title?, company?, avatarSrc?, companyLogoSrc?}]

## 7) Contact Section
- Components:
  - Section Header (title, short invitation text)
  - Contact Form:
    - Fields: Name, Email, Subject, Message
    - Validation messages (inline + summary)
    - Consent/Privacy checkbox (optional)
    - Submit Button (loading state)
  - Contact Details Panel (email, phone, location)
  - Success/Failure Feedback Banner
- Validation & Handling:
  - Client-side validation (required, email format, min length)
  - Server-side endpoint integration (POST)
  - Honeypot or captcha (optional)
- Data Needed:
  - contact: {destinationEmail or apiEndpoint, successMessage, errorMessage}
  - contactDetails: {email, phone?, location?, officeHours?}

## 8) Footer
- Components:
  - Footer Top: Quick Links (repeat nav or key sections)
  - Social Links Row (icons)
  - Copyright Notice
  - Secondary Nav: Privacy Policy, Terms
- Data Needed:
  - footerLinks: [{label, href}]
  - socialLinks: [{platform, url, icon}]
  - legal: {copyrightText, year}

## 9) Navigation & Section Anchors
- Anchors: #home (hero), #skills, #work, #testimonials, #contact
- Scrollspy: highlights current nav item based on section in view

## 10) Component Families Coverage
- Layout: Page Container, Grid/Columns, Section Wrappers, Modal, Drawer
- Navigation: Header Nav, Mobile Menu, Filter Chips, Carousel Controls, Pagination Dots
- Data Display: Hero Text, Skill Progress Bars, Portfolio Cards, Testimonial Cards, Contact Details
- Forms: Contact Form (fields, validation, submission states)
- Buttons/CTAs: Primary/Secondary CTAs, Filter Chips, Modal Controls, Carousel Prev/Next, Submit Button
- Feedback: Inline Validation, Toast/Banner for form result, Loading/Empty states, Scrollspy active state

## 11) Component Hierarchy & Nesting
- App
  - Header
    - Logo
    - PrimaryNav
    - CtaButton
    - MobileToggle
    - MobileDrawer -> NavList + Cta
  - Main
    - Hero
      - Media(ProfileImage)
      - Content(Heading, Subheading, Bio, CTAs, SocialIcons)
    - Skills
      - SectionHeader
      - SkillsGrid -> SkillItem* -> ProgressBar
    - Portfolio
      - SectionHeader + FilterChips
      - ImageGrid -> PortfolioCard* -> HoverOverlay + QuickViewButton
      - LightboxModal -> MediaCarousel + ProjectDetails
    - Testimonials
      - SectionHeader
      - Carousel -> TestimonialCard* + Controls
    - Contact
      - SectionHeader
      - ContactForm -> Fields + Validation + Submit
      - FeedbackBanner
      - ContactDetailsPanel
  - Footer
    - QuickLinks
    - SocialLinks
    - Legal

## 12) Data Flow & Integration
- Static/Config: navigationItems, socialLinks, typography/theme tokens
- CMS/JSON: portfolioItems, testimonials, skills
- Runtime:
  - Scroll events: header elevation, scrollspy, progress bar animation triggers
  - Modal state: selected portfolioItem, lightbox index
  - Form state: values, validation errors, submission status

## 13) Accessibility & SEO Touchpoints
- Semantic landmarks: header, nav, main, section, footer
- Alt text for all images; labels for form fields
- Keyboard trapping in modal; focus management for drawer and modal
- Descriptive headings (H1 in hero, H2 for sections)

## 14) Animation Guidelines
- Use subtle fades/slides (150–300ms, ease-out)
- Animate on-view for sections (intersection observer)
- Reduce motion preference respected

## 15) Required Data Summary by Section
- Header: navigationItems, brand, cta
- Hero: hero text/CTAs, profileImage, socialLinks
- Skills: skills
- Portfolio: portfolioItems, filter categories
- Testimonials: testimonials
- Contact: contact endpoint/messages, contactDetails
- Footer: footerLinks, socialLinks, legal
